name: Hera
god: {{unbulleted list|Queen of the Gods|Goddess of marriage, women, marital harmony, and the protector of women during childbirth}}
sibling: Poseidon, Hades, Demeter, Hestia, Zeus; Chiron (half-sibling|half)
children: Angelos (Greek mythology)|Angelos, Arge, Ares, the Charites, Eileithyia, Eleutheria, Enyo, Eris (mythology)|Eris, Hebe (mythology)|Hebe, Hephaestus
